42 enum class CameraOption {
43  kFrustumCulling = (1 << 0), // Flag to toggle frustum culling
44  kOcclusionCulling = (1 << 1), // Flag to toggle occlusion culling
45  kShowAllRenderLayers = (1 << 2), // Flag to force rendering of all render layers, even those unassociated with the camera
46  kEnablePostProcessing = (1 << 3), // Flag to enable post-processing effects
47  kUseZBufferPass = (1 << 4) // Flag to make a zbuffer pass before rendering scene
48 };
49 typedef QFlags<CameraOption> CameraOptions;
50 
52 enum class CameraType {
53  kCamera = 0,
54  kSceneCamera,
55  kSphereCamera
56 };
57 
59 enum class CameraUpdateFlag {
60  kViewUpdated = 1 << 0,
61  kProjectionUpdated = 1 << 1
62 };
63 typedef QFlags<CameraUpdateFlag> CameraUpdateFlags;
64
